Room.Name: Waterfront Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Waterfront Way, south of the DeNail Corn Fields.
Room.LongDescription: There is a small post office located on the southern side of Waterfront Way where you can send mail to friends and relatives without actually having to leave the town. On the north side of the road are the DeNail Corn Fields, where, quite obviously, corn is grown in massive quantities. Waterfront Way continues to the east and west.
